amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress that external and independent oversight of the National Nuclear Security Administration by the Department of Energy is critical to the mission of protecting the United States nuclear security enterprise.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3279 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3279 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Nelson NE. (consideration: CR S7196-7201; text: CR S7201) To express the sense of Congress that external and independent oversight of the National Nuclear Security Administration by the Department of Energy is critical to the mission of protecting the United States nuclear security enterprise.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3279 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3279 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Nelson NE.
